title: I have star guardian ahri skin, whenever I play with this skin game crushes
body: Titles says all I don't know what to do.

replies.body: Try repairing the game. Under settings -> full game repair.

+1 to this. 

If you're still having issues after, lmk! :)

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=0OYMkmOb,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-09-14T16:05:47.717+0000)
>
> +1 to this.

> If you're still having issues after, lmk! :)

actually It fixed the problem thanks :)
